mapper.select: SELECT TC.ID AS ID, TA.TCHR_NO AS TCHR_NO, SBJT_CHRG, NM, TA.SLR AS SLR, TCHR_INTRO, TCHR_PT FROM TB_TCHR TC INNER JOIN TB_TCHRASSN TA ON TA.TCHR_NO = TC.TCHR_NO INNER JOIN TB_USR US ON US.ID = TC.ID WHERE CLSS_ID = #{clssId}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO TB_TCHRASSN USING DUAL ON (TCHR_NO = #{tchrNo} AND CLSS_ID = #{clssId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SLR = #{slr} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(TCHR_NO, CLSS_ID, SLR) VALUES(#{tchrNo}, #{clssId}, #{slr})
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, NM, SLR, RETIRED_DT, EMP.ID AS ID FROM TB_EMP EMP INNER JOIN TB_USR USR ON EMP.ID = USR.ID WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
SELECT EMP.ID AS ID, EMP_NO, NM, SLR, RETIRED_DT FROM TB_EMP EMP INNER JOIN TB_USR USR ON EMP.ID = USR.ID WHERE USR_TP = 'ROLE_STAFF' ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EMP(EMP_NO, ID, SLR) VALUES(#{empNo}, #{id}, #{slr})

insert.if: INSERT INTO TB_TCHR(TCHR_NO, ID, SBJT_CHRG, TCHR_INTRO, EMP_NO) VALUES(#{tchrNo}, #{id}, #{sbjtChrg}, #{tchrIntro}, #{empNo})
INSERT INTO TB_TCHR(TCHR_NO, ID, SBJT_CHRG, TCHR_INTRO, EMP_NO, TCHR_PT) VALUES(#{tchrNo}, #{id}, #{sbjtChrg}, #{tchrIntro}, #{empNo}, #{tchrPt})

mapper.select: SELECT NM, TCHR_NO FROM TB_TCHR TCHR INNER JOIN TB_USR USR ON TCHR.ID = USR.ID WHERE SBJT_CHRG = #{sbjtNm}

SELECT TCHR.ID AS ID, NM, TCHR.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, EMP.SLR AS SLR, TCHR_NO, SBJT_CHRG, TCHR_INTRO, TCHR_PT FROM TB_TCHR TCHR INNER JOIN TB_EMP EMP ON TCHR.EMP_NO = EMP.EMP_NO INNER JOIN TB_USR USR ON TCHR.ID = USR.ID WHERE TCHR_NO = #{tchrNo}
SELECT TCHR.ID AS ID, TCHR_NO, SBJT_CHRG, NM, EMP_NO FROM TB_TCHR TCHR INNER JOIN TB_USR USR ON TCHR.ID = USR.ID WHERE USR_TP = 'ROLE_TCHR' ORDER BY TCHR_NO DESC
